channel.title: CVE Feed for Fernhill -- SCADA Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fernhill -- SCADA Server

item.title: CVE-2022-21155|2024-08-03T02:31:59.261Z -- fernhill -- scada%20server
item.description: A specially crafted packet sent to the Fernhill SCADA Server Version 3.77 and earlier may cause an exception, causing the server process (FHSvrService.exe) to exit.
